_metadata.description: A library of reusable tactical blocks for the Sofi Pro engine.

openers.name: Collaborative Frame Opener
openers.text: Before we dive into the details, I'd like to make sure we're aligned on the main goal: finding a solution that works well for both of us in the long run. What does a successful outcome look like from your perspective?

openers.name: Confident Value Statement
openers.text: Thanks for your time today. My goal is to establish a partnership where the value we both receive is clear and significant. Based on the unique contribution I can make here, I'm confident we can reach an agreement that reflects that.

counters.name: Reframe from Price to Value
counters.text: I appreciate the offer. Perhaps it would be helpful if I clarified the unique value and the specific results I bring to the table, as it seems we might be valuing the role differently. For example...

counters.name: Leverage Time Pressure
counters.text: I understand the need to consider things carefully. To be transparent, I do have other opportunities with timelines, so it would be helpful to know what a realistic timeframe for a decision looks like on your end.

counters.name: Refocus Pivot
counters.text: That’s a useful point. Let’s park it for a moment and come back to it right after we align on the core terms.

counters.name: Calm Boundary Setting
counters.text: I want to keep this conversation productive and professional. Let’s stick to the facts of the deal so we can find a solution that works for both of us.

micro_tactics.name: Strategic Silence
micro_tactics.description: After they make an offer, especially a poor one, pause for 3-5 seconds before responding. This creates pressure and often encourages them to elaborate or improve their offer without you saying a word.

micro_tactics.name: Language Mirroring
micro_tactics.description: Subtly repeat the last few words of their statement as a question (e.g., If they say 'Our budget is very tight', you respond '...very tight?'). This builds rapport and encourages them to explain further.
